articles.description: The Australian dollar is moving higher for several reasons, and one of those reasons is also tied to how much you'll be paying on your monthly mortgage repayments — potentially as soon as later this year, writes David Taylor.
articles.content:
The Australian dollar is on the move, now hovering around 80 US cents.
Over February alone it's gained roughly 5 cents against the US dollar. That's quite a move for any currency.
The Australian do… [+6620 chars]
